nowloading: tenpo ni la ilo Sh1rga li pali...
loadingview1: ken la sina wile e tenpo li mute.
loadingview2: o awen tawa kama pi pali.
waitjoin1: o awen tawa kama pi ona...
deletecheck: moli e tomo ala awen e tomo? (tawa awen lukin la moli e tomo)
joinerror: tawa e tomo li pakala tan ni: ijo tan.
joinrnf: tawa e tomo li pakala tan ni: ken lukin e tomo ala.
joined2: pini la wan jan li tawa e tomo.
roomnotfound2: pini la tomo li moli anu tomo li lape.
serverdown1: jan pali pi pana li pini.
serverdown2: o lukin e ilo Twitter anu ante.
notconnect_re: tawa awen toki lon jan pali pi pana...
notconnect_1: toki lon jan pali pi pana li pini.
notconnect10_1: ken toki kepeken jan pali pi pana ala.
notconnect30_1: toki lon jan pali pi pana li pakala.
notconnect30_2: o tawa awen toki lon jan pali pi pana.
tos: sina kepeken e ilo Sh1rga la sina pilin sama e Sh1rga ken lawa.
